fields.label: Spørsmål
fields.description: Valfritt tekstleg spørsmål. (Kortet kan innehalde bilde, tekst, eller begge deler)

fields.label: Svar
fields.description: Svar (fasit) for kortet. Use a forward slash / to split alternative solutions. Use \/ if a solution should contain a /.

fields.label: Bilde
fields.description: Valfritt tekstleg spørsmål. (Kortet kan innehalde bilde, tekst, eller begge deler)

semantics.label: Tekst for framdrift
semantics.description: Tekst som viser kva for kort ein er på. Variablar tilgjengelig: @card og @total. Eksempel: 'Kort @card av @total'

semantics.label: Krev inndata frå brukaren før fasit blir vist.
Tekst for antall korrekt
semantics.description: Resultattekst. Variablar tilgjengelig: @score og @total. Eksempel: '@score av @total korrekt'

semantics.label: Case sensitive
semantics.description: Makes sure the user input has to be exactly the same as the answer.

semantics.label: Incorrect text for assistive technologies
semantics.default: Feil svar. Det rette svaret var @answer
semantics.description: Text that will be announced to assistive technologies. Use @answer as variable.

semantics.label: Correct feedback text for assistive technologies
semantics.description: Text that will be announced to assistive technologies when a card is answered correctly. Use @answer as variable.

semantics.label: Card change for assistive technologies
semantics.description: Text that will be announced to assistive technologies when navigating between cards. Use @current and @total as variables.

semantics.label: Randomize cards
semantics.description: Enable to randomize the order of cards on display.
